channel.title: Server Run.bat Help [PI]
channel.description:
When I run the server, this comes up in the command prompt.
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Inside it says:
@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server 43594 pause
If anyone could help, that would be great!

item.title: Server Run.bat Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeRenewed RunescapeRenewed
item.description:
@RunescapeRenewed wrote:

Thank you. I have it working now.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Reinstall Java, and set your paths.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Run.bat Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeRenewed RunescapeRenewed
item.description:
@RunescapeRenewed wrote:

When I run the server, this comes up in the command prompt.

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Inside it says:

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server 43594
pause

If anyone could help, that would be great!
